title: Verify all v2 skills work end-to-end
description: Verification story to ensure all v2 skills are properly installed, discoverable, and functional. Run /skills to list all, test each skill's basic workflow.

acceptanceCriteria.text: /skills lists all 6 new skills (skills, linear, convex, worktrees, ralph-install, plus existing)
Linear skill SKILL.md routes to correct workflows
Convex skill detects convex project correctly
Worktrees skill can list existing worktrees
Install wizard check-deps workflow runs without error
All skills have proper symlinks in ~/.claude/commands/
No broken references in any SKILL.md files
